record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 25, 2007)

[Page: H12090]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, due to official business in the 13th Congressional District of Michigan, I unavoidably missed two votes. If I had been present, I would have voted "nay" on rollcall No. 1008, the motion to recommit H.R. 3963, and "yea" on rollcall No. 1009, final passage of H.R. 3963, the Children's Health Insurance Program Reauthorization Act.
